dz } $soften → t \u0361 s ;
dž → d \u0361 ʒ ;
dz → d \u0361 z ;
a → a ;
á → aː ;
ä → ɛ ;
b } $soften → p ;
b → b ;
c → t \u0361 s;  # affricate indicated by ligature tie
č → t \u0361 ʃ;  # affricate indicated by ligature tie
d } [ie] → ɟ ;
d } $soften → t ;
d → d ;
ď } $soften → c ;

é → eː ;
f → f ;

h } $soften → x ;

ĺ → l\u0329ː ;
ľ → ʎ ;
m } [fv] → ɱ ;
m → m ;
n } [kg] → ŋ ;

n → n ;
ň → ɲ ;

ó → ɔː ;
ô → u\u032Fo ;

q → kv ;

š → ʃ ;
t } [ie] → c ;
t → t ;
ť → c ;

ú → uː ;
vz } $soften → fs ;
v } $soften → f ;
